name: Generate random name
func:
const names = ["Lucid Symphony","Kinetic Horizon",
"Cobalt Canopy","Emberforge",
"Zephyr Stream","Evergreen Circuit",
"Mindspring Protocol","Stardust Archive",
"Crimson Cascade","Quantum Forge"]

msg.payload.jugname = names[Math.floor(Math.random() * names.length)]
return msg;

name: Set redis payload
Return daily consumption
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.reduce((acc,[_, x])=>acc + Number(x), 0) / 3.0;
return msg;
